fixes.name: Col DV01
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR EndCash = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[End Cash (in USD)] * POWER(10, 3)
VAR DaysBetween = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Collateral Maturity] - 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate]
RETURN
EndCash * DaysBetween / 365 * 0.01 * 0.01
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the row-level Tableau expression into a DAX calculated column. Used POWER(10,3) for 10^3 and direct date subtraction to get days between 'Collateral Maturity' and 'RpDate'. No aggregates or parameters present, so this remains a calculated column.
